name: Where is it? (johnconnor008)
description:
Welcome!

Find 6 differences in 3 levels in this PowerPoint game. Each level contains a picture with many objects and some animations to show some progression.

GameJam and Idea:

Game created for minibeansjam8 with the theme 'You shouldn't be here'. The idea of this game is to find the difference in each picture that shouldn't be here. If you make one mistake, you have to restart the level.

https://itch.io/jam/minibeansjam8

Engine:

Completely done in MS PowerPoint (M365) and no macros were used! The focus was on the mechanics of right and wrong clicks and some variety in the picture scenes. There should only be used some standard animations and tools from PowerPoint, so there shouldn't be problems with older versions. Please be aware of other presentation software, because I didn't test it.
